Verses: 1 melum, En Sagodharare, Karththarukkul Sandhoshappadungal. Ezhudhinavaigalaiye Ezhudhuvadhu Enakku Varuththamalla, Adhu Ungalukku Nalamaayirukkum.
2 naaigalukku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal, Pollaadha Velaiyaatkalukku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal, Sunnaththukkaararukku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal.
3 enenil, Maamsaththinmel Nambikkaiyaayiraamal, Aaviyinaale Dhevanukku Aaraadhanaiseydhu, Kiristhu Yesuvukkul Menmaipaaraattugira Naame Viruththasedhanamullavargal.
4 maamsaththinmel Nambikkai Vaikkavendumaanaal Naanum Vaikkalaam; Veroruvan Maamsaththinmel Nambikkaiyaayirukka Ninaiththaal Naan Adhigamaai Appadich Seyyalaam.
5 naan Ettaam Naalil Viruththasedhanamadaindhavan, Isravel Vamsaththaan, Benyameen Koththiraththaan, Ebireyaril Pirandha Ebireyan, Niyaayappiramaanaththinpadi Pariseyan;
6 bakthivairaakkiyaththinpadi Sabaiyaith Thunbappaduththinavan, Niyaayappiramaanaththirkuriya Needhiyinpadi Kutranchaattappadaadhavan.
7 aagilum, Enakku Laabamaayirundhavaigalevaigalo Avaigalaik Kiristhuvukku Nashtamendru Enninen.
8 adhumaaththiramalla, En Karththaraagiya Kiristhu Yesuvai Arigira Arivin Menmaikkaaga Ellaavatraiyum Nashtamendru Ennikkondirukkiren.

9 naan Kiristhuvai Aadhaayappaduththikkollumpadikkum, Niyaayappiramaanaththinaal Varugira Suyaneedhiyai Udaiyavanaayiraamal, Kiristhuvaip Patrum Visuvaasaththinaal Varugiradhum Visuvaasamoolamaai Dhevanaal Undaayirukkiradhumaana Needhiyai Udaiyavanaayirundhu, Kiristhuvukkul Irukkiravanendru Kaanappadumpadikkum,

10 ippadi Naan Avaraiyum Avarudaiya Uyirththezhudhalin Vallamaiyaiyum, Avarudaiya Paadugalin Aikkiyaththaiyum Arigiradharkum, Avarudaiya Maranaththirkoppaana Maranaththirkullaagi, Eppadiyaayinum Naan Mariththorilirundhu Uyirodezhundhiruppadharkuth Thagudhiyaagumpadikkum,
11 avarukkaaga Ellaavatraiyum Nashtamendru Vitten; Kuppaiyumaaga Ennugiren.
12 naan Adaindhaayitru, Alladhu Mutrilum Therinavanaanen Endru Ennaamal, Kiristhu Yesuvinaal Naan Edharkaagap Pidikkappatteno Adhai Naan Pidiththukkollumpadi Aasaiyaaith Thodarugiren.
13 sagodharare, Adhaip Pidiththukkondenendru Naan Ennugiradhillai; Ondru Seygiren, Pinnaanavaigalai Marandhu, Munnaanavaigalai Naadi,
14 kiristhu Yesuvukkul Dhevan Azhaiththa Parama Azhaippin Pandhayapporulukkaaga Ilakkai Nokkith Thodarugiren.
15 aagaiyaal, Nammil Therinavargal Yaavarum Indha Sindhaiyaayirukkakkadavom; Endhak Kaariyaththilaavadhu Neengal Vere Sindhaiyaayirundhaal, Adhaiyum Dhevan Ungalukku Velippaduththuvaar.
16 aagilum Naam Edhuvaraiyil Theriyirukkiromo, Adhumudhal Ore Ozhungaai Nadandhukondu, Ore Sindhaiyaayiruppomaaga.
17 sagodharare, Neengal Ennodekoodap Pinbatrugiravargalaagi, Naangal Ungalukku Vazhikaattugirapadi Nadakkiravargalai Maadhiriyaaga Nokkungal.
18 enenil, Anegar Veruvidhamaai Nadakkiraargal. Avargal Kiristhuvin Siluvaikkup Pagaignarendru Ungalukku Anegandharam Sonnen, Ippozhudhu Kanneerodum Sollugiren.
19 avargaludaiya Mudivu Azhivu. Avargaludaiya Dhevan Vayiru, Avargaludaiya Magimai Avargaludaiya Lachchaiye, Avargal Boomikkaduththavaigalaich Sindhikkiraargal.
20 nammudaiya Kudiyiruppo Paralogaththilirukkiradhu, Angeyirundhu Karththaraayirukkira Yesukiristhu Ennum Ratchakar Vara Edhirpaarththukkondirukkirom.

21 avar Ellaavatraiyum Thamakkuk Keezhppaduththikkollaththakka Thammudaiya Vallamaiyaana Seyalinpadiye, Nammudaiya Arpamaana Sareeraththaith Thammudaiya Magimaiyaana Sareeraththirku Oppaaga Maruroopappaduththuvaar.
